name: Blanco - Liga Exclusiva de Familia Natural Connecticut - Gran Toro
brand: Blanco, Liga Exclusiva de Familia Natural Connecticut
additionalNotes: The Blanco Cigar Company is proud to share its family's finest tobacco in this offering - the Liga Exclusiva de Familia. Translating to "Exclusive Blend of the Family", you will find the finest Nicaraguan filler and binders lovingly encased within a Pennsylvania Broadleaf wrapper. If you're looking for a medium to full-body experience bringing heavy notes of cocoa and espresso alongside some sweet spice, this is your cigar.
